name: Chrome - Dark Stylus
description:
Dark theme for the Stylus extension (chrome only).
UserStyles says "Not Available on Chrome" but I have no clue why so manual installation is currently the only choice.

user.name: MetalTxus
user.about: Front-end developer who mainly enjoys watching anime, reading manga, playing games and listening to music (metal and rock mostly).
